Package no.brunostengine

Class Game

java.lang.Object
no.brunostengine.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class Game extends Object implements Observer
The Game class holds the most important and low-level functionality, ensuring everything starts correctly. This is where the very application Window is created and run from. This class contains two important Methods and Properties, such as follows: Changing the current Scene to another Scene, and The property that allows reading which GameObject belongs to a given pixel.
